ValidationRule.description: The Handbook Lost Reason field must be populated in order to populate the Cancel Requested On field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (ISCHANGED(Cancel_Requested_On__c)), (ISPICKVAL(Handbook_Lost_Reason__c, '')), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before the Cancel Requested On field can be modified, you need to enter a value for Handbook Lost Reason field.
